result.execSummary:
The defendant Carlesha L Simmons was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misappropriate ID Info - Obtain Money [Modifiers: as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Restitution joint and several with co-defendant Herbert Williams. Restitution due during probation term. The restitution amount listed reflects an additional Administrative Cost of 10% of the amount of restitution pursuant to Section 973.06(1)(g).  The 5% Restitution Surcharge is equal to 5% of the total of the restitution, costs, attorney fees, and fines, pursuant to Section 973.20(11)(a).

Court costs due during probation term. If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, in addition to all other enforcement sanctions available to the court, a civil judgment enforceable by all creditors' remedies shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.

-No contact with victim or co - defendant, Herbert Williams.
-Pay supervision fees.

Defendant Carlesha L Simmons in court with attorney Wilfred P. de Junco.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters no contest plea. Court examines defendant, finds her guilty and renders sentence.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 6, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Wilfred P. de Junco in court.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. DeJunco states defendant called, ride fell thru. Court adjourns case for plea/sentencing. Court orders bench warrant issued but stayed until next court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 11, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Carlesha L Simmons in court with attorney Wilfred P. de Junco.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. DeJunco requests plea/sentencing date. Bail to continue.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Further proceedings on February 2, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Carlesha L Simmons in court with attorney Wilfred P. de Junco.  Patti L. Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. DeJunco requests another court date.  Further proceedings scheduled for February 2, 2015 at 10:00 am.
